message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $60.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I appreciate your enthusiasm.  While $60 is a good starting point, I'm only able to spend $50 right now. Would you be willing to come down to that price?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand that $50 is a bit tight for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about I offer it to you for $65?
